step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a comfortable posture. Remember to focus on tightening your whole body as you inhale.
Excellent! You placed your hands correctly on your abdomen.  Keep focusing on the deep breaths.
Try to inhale more slowly through your nose and visualize the fluid moving towards your chest. Focus on the whole body muscle tightening.
Remember to exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing the fluid out as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to focus on slow, controlled breathing and whole-body muscle engagement during inhalation and relaxation during exhalation.  Visualizing fluid movement can help improve your technique.
